caption.en: Combat Outpost Herrera, Afghanistan: paratroopers from Chosen Company of the 3rd Battalion (Airborne), 509th Infantry board a waiting CH-47 Chinook helicopter as they begin a helicopter assault mission
caption.cn: 战斗前哨埃雷拉阿富汗： 从第三营 （航空） 的选择公司的伞兵，509th 步兵板 CH-47 奇努克直升机随着他们开始一个直升机袭击特派团的一次等待

caption.en: Ganghwa City, South Korea: two Kingfishers hold food to feed some newly hatched chicks
caption.cn: 江华市、 韩国： 两个翠鸟持有的粮食养活一些新孵出的小鸡

caption.en: Tokyo, Japan: a young girl holds a placard reading: 'Against Nuclear Power!' during a large anti-nuclear rally
caption.cn: 东京，日本： 一个年轻女孩持有布告阅读： '反对核电 ！ ' 期间反核的大规模集会

caption.en: Hyderabad, India: an Indian artist performs with fire during a procession at the Bonalu festival, a Hindu folk festival in the Telangana region
caption.cn: 在： 在印度海得拉巴印度艺术家用火期间执行 Bonalu 节游行、 特伦甘地地区印度教民俗节日

caption.en: Krakow, Poland: cyclists in the rain during the 69th Tour of Poland
caption.cn: 波兰第 69 游在雨中： 在波兰克拉科夫，骑自行车的人

caption.en: Qunu, South Africa: a child carries chairs at the No-Moscow school before celebrations for Nelson Mandela day. The former South African president was born in the village
caption.cn: Qunu，南非： 儿童携带无莫斯科学校在纳尔逊 · 曼德拉日庆祝活动前的椅子。南非前总统出生在村子里

caption.en: Málaga, Spain: penitents take part in the Virgen del Carmen brotherhood procession during the Carmen day celebrations
caption.cn: 西班牙马拉加： 铎参加比尔亨 － 德尔卡门兄弟游行期间卡门国庆节庆祝活动

caption.en: Philadelphia, US: two brothers cool off in a paddling pool, as temperatures soared in the city
caption.cn: 费城、 美国： 两个兄弟凉快戏水池，随着气温飙升在城市

caption.en: Istanbul, Turkey: a helicopter releases water during a fire at a tower block
caption.cn: 土耳其伊斯坦堡： 一架直升机在大楼火灾释放了水

caption.en: Nahr-e Shahi, Afghanistan: a young Afghan labourer grinds wheat at his father's traditional mill
caption.cn: 河-e 夏希、 阿富汗: 一个年轻的阿富汗工人研磨小麦在他父亲的传统磨

caption.en: Madrid, Spain: police cadets attend a graduation ceremony
caption.cn: 马德里，西班牙： 警官参加毕业典礼

caption.en: Jerusalem: Ultra-Orthodox Jewish children wear handcuffs as they protest against a uniform draft law to replace the Tal Law
caption.cn: 耶路撒冷： 极端正统的犹太儿童戴手铐，他们抗议一项法律统一草案，以取代塔拉法

caption.en: Morigaon district, India: grain is transported in a boat through floodwater
caption.cn: Morigaon 区，印度： 在洪水通过船运送粮食

caption.en: Gaza Strip: A cat eats leftover fish in a market
caption.cn: 加沙地带： 在市场中的一只猫吃吃剩的鱼

caption.en: Molinaseca, Spain: a man uses a hose to fight a fire
caption.cn: Molinaseca、 西班牙： 一名男子使用软管来扑灭火灾
